data.name: RabbitMQ Input
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="{{instance_name}}:{{queue}}{{querystring  query_params  extra_query_params}}&queues={{queue}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
